title: 95/299/EC: Commission Decision of 19 July 1995 amending Commission Decision 93/437/EEC laying down specific conditions for importing fishery products from Argentina
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 19 July 1995 amending Commission Decision  93/437/EEC laying down specific conditions for importing fishery products from Argentina (Text with  EEA relevance) (95/299/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annex B of Decision 93/437/EEC is replaced by the Annex to this  Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 19 July 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
ANNEX
'ANNEX B >TABLE>
II. Factory ships >TABLE>
